meanings.definition: relating to or constituting an accessory
meanings.sent1: The accessorial jewelry complemented her outfit perfectly.
meanings.sent2: The purse was an accessorial item that completed her look.
meanings.sent3: He joked that his accessorial hat was his secret weapon against bad hair days.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like an accessorial light that brightened up the room.
meanings.sent5: The accessorial scarf added a pop of color to her ensemble.

meanings.sent1: The accessorial information in the report provided further insights.
meanings.sent2: She packed some accessorial snacks for the road trip.
meanings.sent3: His accessorial jokes kept the mood light during the meeting.
meanings.sent4: The stars were like accessorial decorations in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The accessorial details in the painting enhanced its beauty.
